name: No Worries Massage Candle
description:
All Natural Massage Candle  6oz.

Relax and massage your stress away, with a warm oil massage. 

Ingredient:  All natural soybean wax, Avocado Oil, Shea butter, Kokum butter, Ylang Ylang, Patchouli Essential Oils.

EXTERNAL USE ONLY!

name: Island Coconut Sugar Scrub
description:
All Natural Exfoliating Sugar Scrub

This natural coconut scrub uses all parts of the coconut to exfoliate
your hands, feet, legs, arms, and body. Smells delicious!
Warm if room temperature is below 76 degrees F, as coconut oil solidifies below this temperature.

Ingredient: Demerara Sugar, Organic Virgin Coconut Oil, Coconut Shell Powder, Shredded Coconut, Natural Coconut Fragrance.
FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY
 4 oz.

name: Bath Sea Salts 3 oz.
description:
Choice of:
*Soothing Eucalyptus
*Rosemary Mint
*Relaxing Lavender

Soothing salts to pamper your body, mind and spirit! 

Help to relieve stress, melt away tension and soothe aching muscles. Enough for two baths. Use in the shower to release the aroma. 

Contains: Calcium, Potassium, Magnesium, Sodium, Sulfate.
EO - Eucalyptus, Rosemary & Mint or Lavender Essential Oils

Size: 3 oz

name: Calendula Petal Poo Hair Wash (Organic) 8 fl.oz.
description:
Calendula Petal Poo
Organic Hair Wash 8 fl. oz.  

An organic vegetable base shampoo that moisturizes as it cleans.  Calendula Petals acts as a topical antiseptic and antiviral and is known to relieve skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis.  Contains no surfactants or sulfates.

Natural shampoo density is thinner than commercial shampoo because it contains no harsh thickening chemicals.  It has great lathering and moisturizing results that will do an excellent job cleansing the hair.  You need only a small amount to get the job done! Use sparingly.

Directions: Rinse hair of product build up then add a quarter size amount to hand of shampoo.  Massage into hair and scalp to produce a rich lather.  Thoroughly rinse out shampoo.

Ingredients:
•Purified Water
•Potassium Oleate–from Organic Sunflower Oil (Helianthus annuus)
•Potassium Cocoate-from Organic Coconut Oil  (Cocos nucifera)
•Glycerin
•Sodium Chloride
•Citric Acid
•Organic Calendula Petals

Available in 2 fl. oz. Travel Size

FOR EXTERNAL USE         -                           KEEP OUT OF EYES

name: Shea Butter Cream
description:
Shea Butter Cream
A Hair and Body Butter Cream  2oz.

Made with all natural unrefined shea butter, formulated for medium to course hair.  Shea Butter Cream works to moisturize, condition, add shine and stimulate new growth.  Helps to hold the hairstyle while lightly relaxing curls.  Your hair will love it!

Excellent skin moisturizer, helping to prevent and protect dry skin with the added benefits of natural Coconut, Sweet Almond, Jojoba, Castor, Grapeseed, Meadow Foam and essential oils. 

Ingredients: Butyrospermun parkii (Shea Butter), Cocos nucifera ( Coconut oil), Prunus amygdalus (sweet Almond Oil),  Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba Oil), Ricinus communis (Caster Oil), Vitis vinifera (Grape Seed Oil),  Limnanthes alba (Meadow  Foam Oil),  Honey, Mangifera indica (Mango Butter),  Vitamin E, Rosemary & Ylang Ylang Essential Oils.   

Available in  2, 4 & 8 fl. oz

FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY

name: Mango Butter Cream
description:
Mango Butter
Hair and Body Cream 

A light butter cream for medium to fine natural hair.  Moisturizes, conditions, and stimulate new growth.  Can be used between perms to soften new growth to reducing breakage.

Special blend of natural butters help to moisturize, soften and protect dry skin.

Ingredients: Mangifera indica (Mango Butter), Aloe Barba (Aloe Butter), Shea Butter,  Astrocaryum Tucuma (Tucuma Butter), Cocos nucifera (Coconut Oil), Simmondsia Chinensis  (Jojoba Oil),  Vitis vinifera (Grape Seed Oil), Soy Lecithin, Vitamin E, Ylang Ylang & Sweet Orange Essential Oils

Available in 2, 4 & 8 oz.

FOR EXTERNAL USE

name: Brush and Oil Set
description:
Brush and Nwele Oil Set

Add several drops of My Butter Love oils to saturate brush and use to detangle hair while wet. 

Benefits of using wooden brush:
•Distribute oils throughout the strands of the hair
•Eliminate static, as static causes snapping
•Aid in faster hair growth
•Lessen split ends and hair loss
•Help give more natural curls
•Promote healthier scalp
•Excellent on fragile delicate hair

Also available:  Wooden Comb

name: Nwele Oil & Comb Set
description:
Nwele Oil & Wooden Comb Set


* Nwele Oil 2 fl. oz.
* Wooden Detangling Comb

Saturate comb with  My Butter Love oils. Use while combing out wet hair, gently removing tangles.

Benefits of using a wooden comb:
•Distribute oils throughout the strands of the hair
•Eliminate static, as static causes snapping
•Aid in faster hair growth
•Lessen split ends and hair loss
•Help give more natural curls
•Promote healthier scalp
•Excellent on fragile delicate hair

name: Nwele Oil 1 fl.oz. (Travel Size)
description:
Nwele Oil
Hair & Body Oil 1 fl. oz.

Use daily to reduce frizz, add shine, control dryness, strengthen and moisturize hair and scalp.  Add protection before blow drying hair.

Use oil with My Butter Love wooden comb or brush.

Use as a body oil to nourish skin and help retain moisture. Organic Hemp Seed and Perilla oils offer relief for eczema and psoriasis.  This light formula absorbs quickly into the skin and does not leave a oily feel.

Ingredients: A Special blend of Organic Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia hinensis), Sweet Almond Oil (Prunus amygdalus), Organic Hemp Seed Oil (Cannabis sativa) and Organic Perilla Oil (Perilla Frutescens)

Available in 2 fl. oz. & 4 fl. oz.

FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY

Use as a body oil to nourish skin and help retain moisture. Organic Hemp Seed and Perilla oils offer relief for eczema and psoriasis.  This light formula absorbs quickly into the skin and does not leave a oily feel.

description:

(Organic) Hair & Body Oil

Use as a body oil to nourish skin and help retain moisture. Organic Hemp Seed and Perilla oils offer relief for eczema and psoriasis.  This light formula absorbs quickly into the skin and does not leave a oily feel.

name: Coconut Hair Treatment Oil 4 oz.
description:
Coconut Hair Treatment Oil 4 oz.

Made with Virgin Coconut
For ALL hair types

                                        Suggested Uses
 
Condition:
*As a pre-wash hair treatment apply to hair just before washing.
or
*After washing rub into ends of hair working towards the scalp.

For Dry Scalp:
*Rub into scalp 30 minutes before washing hair, or before going to bed. Cover hair with a towel or shower cap.  Rinse hair with warm water then wash with My Butter Love Hair Wash.

Ingredients: Cocos nucifera (coconut oil),  Olea europaea (olive oil), Vitamin E

name: Calendula Petal Poo Hair Wash 2 fl.oz. (Organic) (Travel Size)

An organic vegetable base shampoo that moisturizes as it cleans.  Calendula Petals acts as a topical antiseptic and antiviral and is known to relieve skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis.  Contains no surfactants or sulfates.

Natural shampoo density is thinner than commercial shampoo because it contains no harsh thickening chemicals.  It has great lathering and moisturizing results that will do an excellent job cleansing the hair.  You need only a small amount to get the job done! Use sparingly.

name: Essentials Moisture Boost Conditioner 2 fl. oz.  (Travel Size)
description:
Essentials Moisture Boost Conditioner 2 fl. oz. 

Essentials
Moisture Boost Conditioner

A mild natural conditioner with excellent wet comb, giving spring, body, manageability and softness.  Gives hair a boost of moisture to soften and manage dryness. 

DIRECTIONS:
After shampooing hair, apply conditioner to hair evenly. 
Rinse with warm water. May be used as a leave-in

INGREDIENTS:
Water, Glycerin, BM, Jojoba Oil, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, 
Campos WMr (A Natural Preservative), Peppermint, Rosemary, Lavender Essential Oils

Available in 8 fl. oz.

name: Essentials Moisture Boost Conditioner 8 fl. oz.
description:
Essentials Moisture Boost Conditioner 8 fl. oz. 

Essentials
Moisture Boost Conditioner

A mild natural conditioner with excellent wet comb, giving spring, body, manageability and softness.  Gives hair a boost of moisture to soften and manage dryness.

Available in 2 fl. oz.

name: It's Itcy!
description:
IT'S ITCY!
Scalp Detoxifier 4 fl oz.

Relief for dry itchy scalp. 

Use as a pre-treatment on dry flaky scalp before washing hair.

Directions: Section hair and spray on scalp. Use every other day to treat scalp until wash day.

Ingredients: Water, Grapefruit Seed Extract, Glycerin, T-Tree, Lavender and Rosemary Essential Oils.

FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.  KEEP OUT OF EYES

name: Vanilla-Cocoa Butter Balm 1oz. (Travel Size)
description:
Vanilla-Cocoa Butter Balm 1oz.

Used to soothe dry skin with a delicious aroma of vanilla, orange and cocoa.

Use on dry flaky areas of the body...elbows, knees, ankles and hands.  Can be used as a delicious massage rub.  

Ingredients: Organic Jojoba Oil (Simmondsia hinensis), Organic Cocoa butter (Theobroma cocoa), Beeswax, Vanilla absolute extract and Organic Sweet Orange essential oils.

Available in 2 oz. size

FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY

name: Vanilla-Cocoa Butter Balm 2oz.
description:
Vanilla-Cocoa Butter Balm 2oz.

A thick balm used to soothe dry skin with a delicious aroma of vanilla and cocoa.

Use on dry flaky areas of the body...elbows, knees, ankles and hands.  Can be used as a delicious massage rub.  

Ingredients: Organic JojobaOil (Simmondsia hinensis), Organic Cocoa butter (Theobroma cocoa), Beewax, Vanilla absolute extract and Organic Sweet Orange essential oils.

Available in 1 oz.  Travel Size
